Control Name: Remediates Misuse of Personal Information by a Third Party—The entity takes remedial action in response to misuse of personal information by a third party to whom the entity has transferred such information.

control_attributes.Control: Remediates Misuse of Personal Information by a Third Party—The entity takes remedial action in response to misuse of personal information by a third party to whom the entity has transferred such information.
control_attributes.SubCategory: P6.6 The entity provides notification of breaches and incidents to affected data subjects, regulators, and others to meet the entity’s objectives related to privacy.
